original_title: Jamaica y Tamarindo: Afro Tradition in the Heart of Mexico
overview: The Jamaica flower and tamarind are iconic ingredients in Mexico, but their history comes from a place much further away. In Jamaica & Tamarindo: Afro Tradition in the Heart of Mexico, we meet five people who explore African heritage in Mexico City, an identity that goes beyond the color of one's skin.
title: Jamaica y Tamarindo: Afro Tradition in the Heart of Mexico
